meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Santa Cruz Valley Unified School District, Santa Cruz schools, Santa Cruz district, Santa Cruz Valley, Rio Rico schools, Rio Rico, AZ, santa cruz valley rico rio, scv rico rio, scvusd, scvusd rico rio

meta.name: description
meta.content: Welcome to the online home of Santa Cruz Valley Unified School District! Nestled among the beautiful San Cayetano Mountains in southern Arizona, we are a high performing school district serving six rural communities.

img.name: t1486:r1:c1:f80225
img.alt: Santa Cruz Valley Unified School District No.35 | Educate Everyone Every Day

div.p: Dear Families,
Governor Ducey and Superintendent Hoffman announced the extended closure of Arizona schools until the end of the 20192020 school year as a necessary step in stopping the spread of COVID-19.

Although all school sites and activities will remain closed through the end of the school year, the at-home learning opportunities which have been communicated by your student's school will continue as planned.
Meal services for students will also continue throughout the remainder of the school year.

More specific information regarding grading, graduation, transitions, and other related activities will be communicated to families as we gather information. We understand this has been an adjustment for schools and families and we certainly appreciate everything our staff, families, and students are doing to continue the learning. If you have any questions, please reach out to your child's principal or teacher.
View the governor's full announcement online.

div.b: SCV35 At-Home Learning Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)

p.strong: What are the academicexpectations for my student?

div.p: Below find the expectations for students from April 6 through the remainder of the school year.
Below are links to questions specific to each site.

li.a: Spring Sports for CK8, CtMS, andRRHS

div.p: This link includes information from 3rd party companies regarding offers for families during the COVID-19 crisis.

p.strong: Who Do I Contact for Help?

div.p: General Questions - Please email your site principal.
Student Technical Issues

ul.li: Students and families can email the teacher. He or she will guide you depending on the issue.

div.p: Student Meal Assistance

ul.li:
If your student needs assistance with meals pick up, please email the parent liaison at your school.
Calabasas PreK-8 School -Irma Velez
Coatimundi Middle School -Yara Sanchez
Mountain View Elementary School -Dulce Alvarez
Rio Rico High School -Virginia Garayzar
San Cayetano Elementary -Claudina Puig

p.strong: Where Do I Get Meals for My Student?

div.p: Meals will be provided on Monday throughFridayfrom 11:00 a.m. to1:00 p.m.at the following locations:

Meals will be available curbside, or adults can park and pick up. In addition to the pick-up sites, there will be an east and west bus delivery route for families who are unable to pick up from the sites. The locations and times for the routes are availableonline.
Adults prices - $2.35 for breakfast and $3.55 for lunch - Cash only.

p.strong: New - Does My Student Need to be Present When I Pick Up the Meals?

div.p: No. The federal program has relaxed the guidelines so adults may now pick up their childs foodwithout children being present.

p.strong: Who is Eligible to Receive Meals?

div.p: Any child, 18 years or younger. Regardless of where they attend school.

p.strong: What Information Do I Need in Order to Pick Up Food for My Child?

div.p: Please have your childs age, grade, and school they attend. If your child does not attend school, or does not attend school in the district, they may still pick up food.

p.strong: How Do I Register My Child for Next Year?

div.p: Students who are currently enrolled do not need to enroll for the upcoming year. However, students new to our district will need to register online. Pleasevisit our Registration pagefor a list of forms. For questions, pleasecontact us via email.

div.b: SCV35 Aprendizaje en el hogar Preguntas frecuentes (FAQ)

p.strong: Cules son las expectativas acadmicas para mi estudiante?

div.p: A continuacin encontrar las expectativas para los estudiantes desde el 6 de abril hasta el resto del ao escolar.

li.a: 6 de abril de 2020 - Informacin para padres

div.p: A continuacin encontrar enlaces a preguntas especficas de cada sitio escolar.

p.strong: A quin contacto para obtener ayuda?

div.p: Preguntas generales -Enviar un correo electrnico al director de la escuela.
Problemas tcnicos del alumno

ul.li: Los alumnos y familias pueden enviar un correo electrnico al maestro/a. l o ella lo guiar segn el problema.

div.p: Asistencia de comida para estudiantes

ul.li:
Si su estudiante necesita ayuda para recoger las comidas, enve un correo electrnico al representante del vnculo de padres de su escuela.
Escuela Calabasas PreK8 -Irma Velez
Escuela Intermedia Coatimundi -Yara Sanchez
Escuela primaria Mountain View -Dulce Alvarez
Escuela secundaria Rio Rico -Virginia Garayzar
Escuela primaria San Cayetano -Claudina Puig

p.strong: Dnde obtengo comidas para mi estudiante?

div.p: Las comidas se proporcionarn de lunes a viernes de las 11:00 a.m. a1:00 p.m. en los siguientes lugares.

Las comidas estarn disponibles en la acera, o los padres pueden estacionar su auto y recoger. Adems de los lugares para recoger comida, tambin habr rutas de autobuses Este y Oeste para las familias que no puedan recoger. Las ubicaciones y horarios de rutas se pueden encontrar aqu.
Precios para adultos: $2.35 para el Desayuno y $3.55 para el almuerzo. Solo se acepta dinero en efectivo.

p.strong: Nuevo: Mi estudiante debe estar presente cuando recojo las comidas?

div.p: No. El programa federal ha relajado las pautas para que los adultos ahora puedan recoger la comida de sus hijos sin que los nios estn presentes.

p.strong: Quin es elegible para recibir comidas?

div.p: Cualquier nio, menor de 18 aos. Independientemente de dnde asisten a la escuela.

p.strong: Qu informacin necesito para recoger comida para mi hijo/hija?

div.p: Indique la edad, el grado y la escuela a la cual asiste su hijo/a. Si su hijo/a no asiste a la escuela, o no asiste a una escuela en el distrito, an as puede recoger comida.

p.strong: Cmo registro a mi hijo/hija para el prximo ao?

div.p: Los estudiantes que estn actualmente inscritos no necesitan inscribirse para el prximo ao. Sin embargo, los estudiantes nuevos en nuestro distrito debern registrarse en lnea. Visite nuestra pgina de registro para obtener una lista de formularios. Para preguntas, contctenos por correo electrnico.

br.p: Want to learn more about the coronavirus, what it is, situation updates, and prevention tips? Below are links to trusted sources of information that might help.
